quotes.quotes: We build our computer (systems) the way we build our cities: over time, without a plan, on top of ruins.
quotes.name: -Ellen Ullman-

quotes.quotes: What one programmer can do in one month, two programmers can do in two months.
quotes.name: -Fred Brooks-

quotes.quotes: Every great developer you know got there by solving problems they were unqualified to solve until they actually did it.
quotes.name: -Patrick McKenzie-

quotes.quotes: A primary cause of complexity is that software vendors uncritically adopt almost any feature that users want.
quotes.name: -Niklaus Wirth-

quotes.quotes: No one in the brief history of computing has ever written a piece of perfect software. It's unlikely that you'll be the first.
quotes.name: -Andy Hunt-

quotes.quotes: Java is to JavaScript as ham is to hamster.
quotes.name: -Jeremy Keith-

quotes.quotes: One of the best programming skills you can have is knowing when to walk away for awhile
quotes.name: -Oscar Godson-

quotes.quotes: One of the best programming skills you can have is knowing when to walk away for awhile
quotes.name: -Louis Srygley-

quotes.quotes: A program is never less than 90% complete, and never more than 95% complete
quotes.name: -Terry Baker-

quotes.quotes: Programming languages, like pizzas, come in only too sizes; too big and too small.
quotes.name: -Richard E. Pattis-
